Cramlington Park, Northumberland Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest - 1st Swan Hunter, 2nd Blyth L.N.E.R. Hymn tune contest - 1st Swan Hunter, 2nd Blyth L.N.E.R. 5 bands competed.
